attributes.background: Trade unions have been useful in guaranteeing workers rights historically. However now that these are secure within the UK, they are unnecessary as they cause disruption to key public services and contribute heavily to real wage unemployment as well as cost-push inflation within the economy.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
